name: places/ChIJQUF8aSNZwokRMogg_47yohg
formattedAddress: 120 E 7th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 E 7th St, New York, NY 10009-6122, USA

originalText.text:
I recently visited this nail art salon and was completely blown away by the level of talent and creativity displayed by their nail artists. The attention to detail and precision in their work is truly impressive. The salon's ambiance is relaxing and inviting, making it a perfect place to unwind while getting pampered. The clients here are all very friendly too!

I opted for a unique and intricate design, and the nail artist not only executed it flawlessly but also added their own artistic touch, making the final result even better than I had imagined. The range of nail polish colors and decorations available is vast, allowing for endless customization.

Angel and Jana was incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that I was comfortable throughout the entire process. Cleanliness and hygiene were also top-notch, which is something I greatly appreciate, especially in a nail salon.They also use a lot of new techniques that are trendy in Asia.

If you're looking for a place to get stunning nail art that truly stands out, this salon is a hidden gem. I left feeling not only satisfied with my gorgeous nails but also impressed by the overall experience. I can't wait to return for another fabulous nail art session! Highly recommended!

originalText.text: I came here with a friend to get my nails done for the first time, and the process was super quick and comfortable! The nail technicians are really attentive — I requested specific nail art and they consistently checked with me throughout the process to make sure I was satisfied :) The price was also very reasonable for the level of detail, and they gave us really cute mini hair clips as a gift too!

text.text: I came here with a friend to get my nails done for the first time, and the process was super quick and comfortable! The nail technicians are really attentive — I requested specific nail art and they consistently checked with me throughout the process to make sure I was satisfied :) The price was also very reasonable for the level of detail, and they gave us really cute mini hair clips as a gift too!

originalText.text: First time coming to No Nail and had the best experience!! I got a gel mani and regular pedi and was in and out within an hour and she did a great job. The highlight was one of the nail techs had the sweetest dog and let her sit with me while I got my pedi. So well behaved and truly a therapeutic experience. Can’t wait to go back!!!

text.text: First time coming to No Nail and had the best experience!! I got a gel mani and regular pedi and was in and out within an hour and she did a great job. The highlight was one of the nail techs had the sweetest dog and let her sit with me while I got my pedi. So well behaved and truly a therapeutic experience. Can’t wait to go back!!!

originalText.text: I absolutely, 100%, recommend No Nail Salon. They were welcoming and nice. Angel knew right away the kind of design I wanted and gave me recommendations on how it could look even better. She was meticulous and precise in everything she did. This will be my new go-to nail salon!"

text.text: I absolutely, 100%, recommend No Nail Salon. They were welcoming and nice. Angel knew right away the kind of design I wanted and gave me recommendations on how it could look even better. She was meticulous and precise in everything she did. This will be my new go-to nail salon!"

originalText.text: The most fun experience! Super professional and came up with a design that best suited my hand shape and desire. Also made sure I got the long lasting treatment. Loved chatting with them - really funny, considerate and caring women. Very clean, definitely adding to list of must-do New York things.
